title: Blanket, "Sampler Blanket #7", 2004
medium:
Medium: wool, polyester
Technique: needle punched wool and wool applique with machine embroidery
description: Navy background with pink bands at the top and bottom.  In the lower left there are cherry blossoms in pink patterned wool with light green leaves.  At the top is a deer.  There are white "x" patterns reminiscent of cross-stitch embroidery on the left side, and white embroidered cherry blossoms.
